column4: Hey any1 know what could be wrong with slow compiz performance on an out of the box installation? I have ati x1300 radeon and a 2ghz sempron cpu... =P
Hey any1 know what could be wrong with slow compiz performance on an out of the box installation of ubuntu 10.04? I have ati x1300 radeon and a 2ghz sempron cpu... =P
That should improve performance at least by a bit.
you'll want to install the ATI proprietary driver. Hit up System -> Administration -> Hardware Drivers.
